# Network Programming Docs

> Documentation for Network Programming Docs.

*Topics available: 40*

- [About the System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration Namespace](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/about-the-system-net-peertopeer-collaboration-namespace.md): Learn more about: About the System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration Namespace
- [Basic and Digest Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/basic-and-digest-authentication.md): Learn to use basic and digest authentication, where an application provides a user name and password in the WebRequest object that it uses to request data.
- [Best Practices for System.Net Classes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/best-practices-for-system-net-classes.md): Follow these recommendations to use the classes contained in System.Net to their best advantage in .NET Framework programming.
- [Cache Management for Network Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/cache-management-for-network-applications.md): Learn more about: Cache Management for Network Applications
- [Cache Policy Interaction—Maximum Age and Maximum Staleness](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/cache-policy-interaction-maximum-age-and-maximum-staleness.md): Learn more about: Cache Policy Interaction—Maximum Age and Maximum Staleness
- [Cache Policy Interaction—Maximum Age and Minimum Freshness](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/cache-policy-interaction-maximum-age-and-minimum-freshness.md): Learn more about: Cache Policy Interaction—Maximum Age and Minimum Freshness
- [Cache Policy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/cache-policy.md): Learn about cache policy, the rules that determine whether a request can be satisfied using a cached copy of the requested resource.
- [Certificate Selection and Validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/certificate-selection-and-validation.md): Find out about  several ways System.Net classes offer to select and validate certificates for SSL/TLS connections.
- [Configuring Caching in Network Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/configuring-caching-in-network-applications.md): Learn more about: Configuring Caching in Network Applications
- [Configuring Internet Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/configuring-internet-applications.md): Learn how to use the <system.Net> element to configure internet applications in the .NET Framework. This article contains example code.
- [Enabling Network Tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md): Learn how to enable network tracing, which provides information about method invocations and network traffic for a managed application in the .NET Framework.
- [FTP](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/ftp.md): Learn about the comprehensive support for the FTP protocol that .NET Framework provides with the FtpWebRequest and FtpWebResponse classes.
- [How to: Configure Network Tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-configure-network-tracing.md): Learn how to configure network tracing in the computer configuration file or application configuration file. An application configuration file takes precedence.
- [How to: customize a time-based cache policy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-customize-a-time-based-cache-policy.md): Learn more about: How to: customize a time-based cache policy
- [How to: Download files with FTP](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-download-files-with-ftp.md): This article shows a sample of how to download a file from an FTP server.
- [How to: List directory contents with FTP](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-list-directory-contents-with-ftp.md): This article shows a sample of how to list the directory contents of an FTP server.
- [How to: Set a Location-Based Cache Policy for an Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-set-a-location-based-cache-policy-for-an-application.md): Learn more about: How to: Set a Location-Based Cache Policy for an Application
- [How to: Set Cache Policy for a Request](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-set-cache-policy-for-a-request.md): Learn how to set a cache policy for a request in the .NET Framework. This cache policy allows a resource to be used from the cache for up to a day.
- [How to: Set the Default Time-Based Cache Policy for an Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-set-the-default-time-based-cache-policy-for-an-application.md): Learn more about: How to: Set the Default Time-Based Cache Policy for an Application
- [How to: Upload files with FTP](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/how-to-upload-files-with-ftp.md): This article shows a sample of how to upload a file to an FTP server.
- [Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/integrated-windows-authentication-with-extended-protection.md): Learn more about: Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection
- [Internet Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/internet-authentication.md): Learn about the variety of client authentication mechanisms that System.Net classes support for your applications in the .NET Framework.
- [Interpreting Network Tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/interpreting-network-tracing.md): Find out how to use tracing to capture calls your application makes to various System.Net class members in the .NET Framework.
- [Location-Based Cache Policies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/location-based-cache-policies.md): Learn more about: Location-Based Cache Policies
- [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md): Learn about network tracing in the .NET Framework, which provides information about method invocations and network traffic for a managed application.
- [NTLM and Kerberos Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/ntlm-and-kerberos-authentication.md): Learn how default NTLM authentication and Kerberos authentication work for a .NET Framework application and learn about non-default NTLM authentication.
- [Peer Name Publication and Resolution](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/peer-name-publication-and-resolution.md): Learn more about: Peer Name Publication and Resolution
- [Peer Name Resolution Protocol](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/peer-name-resolution-protocol.md): Learn about the Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRP), a secure, scalable, and dynamic name registration and name resolution protocol.
- [Peer Names and PNRP IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/peer-names-and-pnrp-ids.md): Learn more about: Peer Names and PNRP IDs
- [Peer-to-Peer Collaboration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/peer-to-peer-collaboration.md): Learn more about: Peer-to-peer collaboration
- [Peer-to-Peer Networking Scenarios](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/peer-to-peer-networking-scenarios.md): Learn more about: Peer-to-Peer Networking Scenarios
- [PNRP Caches](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/pnrp-caches.md): Learn more about: PNRP Caches
- [PNRP Clouds](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/pnrp-clouds.md): Learn more about: PNRP Clouds
- [PNRP in Application Development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/pnrp-in-application-development.md): Learn more about: PNRP in Application Development
- [Security in network programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/security-in-network-programming.md): Learn about popular application authentication mechanisms and code access permissions that the .NET Framework System.Net namespace classes support.
- [Time-Based Cache Policies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/time-based-cache-policies.md): Learn more about: Time-Based Cache Policies
- [Transport Layer Security (TLS) best practices with .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/tls.md): Describes best practices using Transport Layer Security (TLS) with .NET Framework
- [Using Secure Sockets Layer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/using-secure-sockets-layer.md): Learn about how System.Net and extending classes use the Secure Sockets Layer to encrypt the connection for several network protocols in the .NET Framework.
- [Using UDP Services](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/using-udp-services.md): The UdpClient class abstracts the details to create a socket to request and receive data using UDP in the .NET Framework.
- [Web and Socket Permissions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/web-and-socket-permissions.md): Learn how the WebPermission and SocketPermission classes provide internet security for using the System.Net namespace in the .NET Framework.
